name: get_6_month_historical_daily_prices
description:
This is a sub-function API for tool stock_prices.
Tool description: Returns the adjusted open, high, low, and close price for a given symbol.  Volume, dividend, and stock split information is also included for each symbol.
API description: Retrieves 6 months of historical daily stock prices for the given ticker, including adjusted Open, High, Low, and Close prices, as well as Daily Volume, Dividend, and Split information.

ticker.description: The stock ticker symbol for which to retrieve the historical prices.
